page.shortlink: ux controlbar items clipping rectangle top property
page.description: The distance in pixels from the top of the screen to the top edge of the clipping rectangle.

discussion.p: Defines the distance between the top of the clipping rectangle and the screen. For example, if a value of 50 is specified for the *[ui:top]* property, the top edge of the clipping rectangle with be 50 pixels from the top of the screen.
